law.catch_line: In this section, "immediate family relative" means:...

text.section:
A person that is eligible for membership under subsection (b) of this section becomes a member when the person:
Subscribes to and pays for at least one share; and
Meets all of the other requirements of the bylaws of the credit union.
Once an individual who is eligible for membership under subsection (b)(4) or (5) of this section becomes a member, then an immediate family relative of the member is eligible to become a member.

A member remains a member of a credit union until the member:
Chooses to withdraw from the membership of the credit union; or
Is expelled by the board under § 6-319 of this subtitle.
